Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm not feeling all that great. I'm
taking today off work.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Don't worry. If I get enough rest today
I'm sure  I'll feel better tomorrow.
Please, just leave me alone.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm... I'm feeling a little green about
the gills. I'll just go back to bed and
rest.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry to cause you trouble. If I
sleep enough today I'll definitely get
better for tomorrow.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I feel terrible.. guess I'm getting old!
I think I'll spend today in bed, if
that's all the same to you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Sorry about this. I'm sure you can
manage without me for one day.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm not feeling very well today. I was
thinking of taking the day off, if you
don't mind.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Please, do not worry about me. I am
confident I'll be better by tomorrow.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Seems like I'm not in my best condition
today. Sorry, but I'm sitting this one
out.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'll be better tomorrow, you'll see.
Just let me rest.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm feeling a bit sick. I think I'll
just take it easy for today.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I should be better by tomorrow if I 
spend today in bed. Will you be okay
taking care of everything else?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>, but I'm really tired.
I should rest until tomorrow.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Don't worry, honey, I'll be all better
by tomorrow.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
My head hurts. I'm going to take the day
off, okay?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Since I'm not feeling well, could you
take care of the chores, <MYNAME>? Thank
you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I don't... feel good. I'm going to...
rest.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It should go away, if I... take it easy.
Just let me sleep for today.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I feel quite unwell. I'll retire to the
bedroom and rest for the day.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I should be fully recovered by tomorrow.
Please allow me to rest until then.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I feel a bit queasy. I'd better go and
lie down.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'll be fine after I get some sleep.
Sorry for making you worry.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, I'm no good for anything today! I'm
going back to bed to sleep it off.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'll be as good as new tomorrow! Just
let me recharge my magic powers.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
My head feels funny. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Good night.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
My head feels funny. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Nighty-night.

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
My head hurts. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
My head hurts. I'm going to bed.

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I've got some nasty headache. I'm just
going to sleep it off.

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
G'night.

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
My head is pounding! I'll be in my bed
if you need me.

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Good night.
